title: datalad get failing after datalad drop
body:
#### What is the problem?
I currently try to follow the Handbook article which is comparing DataLad to DVC
https://handbook.datalad.org/en/latest/beyond_basics/101-168-dvc.html

#### What steps will reproduce the problem?
Everything works fine until this paragraph
https://handbook.datalad.org/en/latest/beyond_basics/101-168-dvc.html#id10

After dropping the data with ``datalad drop`` I cannot get the data back again with ``datalad get``:
$ datalad get data/raw/val
Total (0 ok, 13 failed out of 3925):   0%|                 | 0.00/31.2M [00:39<?, ?B/s]

#### What version of DataLad are you using (run `datalad --version`)? On what operating system (consider running `datalad wtf`)?

Datalad 0.13.3 on Windows Subsystem Linux 2 (Ubuntu 20.04)

## datalad wtf
## configuration <SENSITIVE, report disabled by configuration>
## datalad
  - full_version: 0.13.3
  - version: 0.13.3
## dataset
